events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and the resume looks promising.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on the candidate's experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to oversee this candidate’s recruitment process.
Initial screening call completed successfully; candidate showed strong understanding of software engineering principles.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for the next steps in the technical interview process.
Technical interview scheduled with the engineering team for May 6th at 2 PM to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
Technical interview was completed with positive feedback from all panel members regarding the candidate’s software knowledge.
HR interview has been scheduled for May 9th to discuss company culture fit and candidate expectations.
HR interview completed; candidate demonstrated strong alignment with company values and career goals.
An offer has been extended to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits aligned with the engineering role.
Candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and asked some clarifying questions about the team structure.
Candidate has accepted the offer and expressed excitement to join the engineering team starting next month.
Onboarding process started with orientation sessions and system access set up for the new software engineer.
The recruitment process has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
